courses.name: Landscaping
courses.description: To provide landscaping services for new and established gardens. Content includes indigenous and exotic plants, garden structures, aesthetics, and garden layout design.

courses.name: First Aid
courses.description: To provide first aid awareness and basic life support. Content includes wounds and bleeding, burns and fractures, emergency scene management, CPR, and respiratory distress.

courses.name: Sewing
courses.description: To provide alterations and new garment tailoring services. Content includes types of stitches, threading a sewing machine, sewing buttons, zips, hems and seams, alterations, and designing garments.

courses.name: Child Minding
courses.description: To provide basic child and baby care. Content includes care for babies (birth to one year), toddlers, and educational toys.

courses.name: Life Skills
courses.description: To provide skills to navigate basic life necessities. Content includes opening a bank account, basic labour law, literacy, and numeric literacy.

courses.name: Garden Maintenance
courses.description: To provide basic knowledge of watering, pruning, and planting in a domestic garden. Content includes watering requirements, pruning, propagation, and planting techniques.

courses.name: Cooking
courses.description: To prepare and cook nutritious family meals. Content includes nutrition basics, meal planning, and cooking tasty recipes.
